The HIFANCY RAINBOW 25000 is designed for vapers who want more control, longer-lasting use, and a variety of flavors. Its adjustable heating modes, voltage regulation, and high puff count make it a top choice for those seeking a premium and personalized vaping experience.

HIFANCY LEGEND 20000

By Jett.Wei From VAPESOOO

The HIFANCY LEGEND 20000 is a state-of-the-art disposable vape device designed to provide a premium vaping experience with an impressive 20,000 puffs. It combines advanced features with a sleek design, making it an ideal choice for vapers seeking longevity and rich flavor.

Key Features:

  • High Puff Count: 20,000 Puffs: Offers an extended vaping experience with a remarkably high number of puffs.
  • Battery Capacity: 750mAh Rechargeable Battery: Equipped with a high-capacity battery that can be recharged via Type-C port to ensure lasting performance.
  • Nicotine Strength Options: 2%, 3%, and 5% Nicotine Salt: Available in multiple nicotine strengths to cater to different preferences.
  • E-Liquid Capacity: 30ml E-Liquid: Large e-liquid capacity supports the high puff count for prolonged usage.
  • Coil Technology: Double Mesh Coil: Delivers consistent and enhanced flavor with every puff.
  • Heating Modes: Two Heating Modes: Provides flexibility with two heating options for a personalized vaping experience.
  • Full Screen Display: Smart Display: Built-in full screen display shows important information such as battery life, puff count, and e-liquid level.
  • Child-Proof Lock: Safety Feature: Includes a child-proof lock for added safety and peace of mind.
  • Digital Oil Power Display: Oil and Power Management: Displays detailed information on oil and power levels for efficient usage management.

Available Flavors:

  • Strawberry Mango
  • Strawberry Watermelon
  • Energy Drink
  • Strawberry Juice
  • Blueberry Raspberry Grape
  • Blue Razz Cherry
  • Kiwi Passion Fruit Guava
  • Raspberry Watermelon Ice
  • Watermelon Bubblegum
  • Peach Berry Ice

Availability:

EU Warehouse: Fast 3-5 day shipping within the EU.

Usage Instructions:

  1. Open the Package: Remove the HIFANCY LEGEND 20000 from its packaging.
  2. Activate: The device is draw-activated, so simply inhale through the mouthpiece to start vaping.
  3. Monitor Usage: Use the full screen display to keep track of battery life, puff count, and e-liquid levels.
  4. Recharge as Needed: When the battery is low, recharge using the Type-C port to ensure continuous usage.
  5. Dispose Responsibly: Once the e-liquid is depleted, dispose of the device according to local electronic waste regulations.

Health and Safety Considerations:

  • Nicotine Content: Choose the appropriate nicotine strength to suit your preferences and avoid overconsumption.
  • Proper Disposal: Follow local guidelines for disposing of electronic devices to ensure environmental responsibility.

products.original_content: Pre purchase instructions      Welcome to Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd. Our company strictly prohibits the purchase of E-Cigarettes and accessories by individuals under the legal age. We ship to 48 states within the United States, excluding New York, Pennsylvania, Montana, and South Carolina. Kindly refrain from making purchases if your address falls within the mentioned restricted areas    Packaging & Shipping      Welcome to Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd. Thank you for choosing our products. Please see below for important information:  When making a payment, kindly list any special requests (color, packages, etc.) in the REMARK section. Processing time varies based on product type and stock status, typically ranging from 3 to 15 working days. Items will be shipped after payment is received by the Third Party (Bank). We use reliable shipping methods such as China Post, EMS, UPS, DHL, FedEx, or Air Mail. Once your package is shipped, you will receive an email with the tracking number. Delivery times vary by country or region. If DHL or UPS is the only available option for delivery to your address, additional fees may apply for remote areas. We are not liable for shipping accidents, delays, or issues caused by shipping carriers or force majeure events. In case of a missed package, we will work with the express company to provide updates. Please understand any delays due to time zone differences.  Thank you for choosing Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd. for your vaping needS                    Company Profile      ¬†  Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd. Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd. is a professional disposable vape manufacturer based in Shenzhen, China. Since our establishment in 2013, we have focused on research and development, producing a variety of flavored disposable vapes. With over 20 successful models launched, our products have received widespread acclaim. Our Advantages:  Marketing: Our excellent marketing team gathers market information, analyzes customer feedback, and requirements to guide new product development. R&D: Our strong R&D team, with experience from top vape companies, ensures our products are at the forefront of the market and meet global customer needs. We also offer custom product design services. Purchase: We source premium materials from reputable suppliers in the industry. QC: Quality is a top priority for us. We implement strict quality control processes from incoming materials to final product inspection, ensuring the quality of every order. content.en:
With people's attention to health and the steady decline in traditional cigarette sales, the electronic cigarette market has opened up new prospects. The eagerly anticipated ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 provides us with a novel way to smoke, yet it remains exquisite and relaxed.

1. Outdoor ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 Design

The exterior design of ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 is simple and fashionable, adopting a streamlined design language, giving people a very comfortable feeling. Due to its small size, it is easy to carry around and does not take up too much space in pockets or backpacks.

2. Delicious electronic cigarette liquid

You don't need to change the chimney frequently because the ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 comes pre installed with 20 milliliters of electronic cigarette juice, allowing you to continue enjoying delicious food. In addition, it also offers you 10 of the most traditional flavor choices, from various flavors to fruit flavors under the sun. Therefore, ZOOY MEGA 12000 is the best choice to meet a range of taste requirements.

3. Strong release of nicotine

ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 is undoubtedly an excellent choice for people who need nicotine immediately. Its 50 milligram nicotine content ensures that you feel satisfied with just one bite, and the nicotine is released quickly, making you feel calm at any time.

ZOOYVAPE Rainbow box 16000

  • 16000puffs
  • 110g 26ml
  • 20mg/50mg nic salt
  • 650mah battery
  • Built-in Smart Display
  • TYPE-C /Adjustable Power

Backed by a strong R&D team with experience from top vape companies, we ensure that our products are at the forefront of the market and meet global customer demands.

We source premium materials from reputable suppliers to guarantee the quality of our products.

QC

We prioritize quality control at every stage of production, from initial inspection to final quality checks, ensuring that your orders meet the highest standards.

Production and Delivery

At Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd., we pride ourselves on our commitment to updating our production schedule daily to identify and address potential risks promptly. Our primary goal is to ensure that every order is completed and shipped on time, as promised to our valued customers.

Welcome to Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd.! Our product line includes two categories: huge puffs and normal puffs. The huge puffs boast 20 models, all equipped with mesh coils for an intense vapor experience. For detailed product information and descriptions, please refer to our "Products" section.

Choose from our registered brands, ZOOY and Savage, known worldwide for their exceptional quality. Check out reviews of our brands on DH-Gate or other vape industry platforms. Our brands have a strong reputation and appeal to new buyers. Alternatively, opt for OEM production to customize products with your brand and logo, with complimentary package design assistance.

Factory Visit

Located just a short drive from Shenzhen airport, our company welcomes visitors at any time. We look forward to establishing a long-term partnership with you!

Production and Delivery

Products at Present

The huge puffs boast 20 models, all equipped with mesh coils for an intense vapor experience. For detailed product information and descriptions, please refer to our Products section.

FAQ

content.en:
Pre-purchase Instructions

Welcome to Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd. Our company strictly prohibits the purchase of E-Cigarettes and accessories by individuals under the legal age. We ship to 48 states within the United States, excluding New York, Pennsylvania, Montana, and South Carolina. Shipments cannot be made to United States Minor Outlying Islands, including Puerto Rico (zip codes 006-009), Virgin Islands, Hawaii, Guam, and Alaska (zip codes 966-969 and 995-999). Please note that we do not deliver to PO. BOX addresses. Kindly refrain from making purchases if your address falls within the mentioned restricted areas.

Packaging & Shipping

Welcome to Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd. Thank you for choosing our products. Please see below for important information:

  • When making a payment, kindly list any special requests (color, packages, etc.) in the REMARK section.
  • Processing time varies based on product type and stock status, typically ranging from 3 to 15 working days.
  • Items will be shipped after payment is received by the Third Party (Bank).
  • We use reliable shipping methods such as China Post, EMS, UPS, DHL, FedEx, or Air Mail.
  • Once your package is shipped, you will receive an email with the tracking number.
  • Delivery times vary by country or region.
  • If DHL or UPS is the only available option for delivery to your address, additional fees may apply for remote areas.
  • We are not liable for shipping accidents, delays, or issues caused by shipping carriers or force majeure events.
  • In case of a missed package, we will work with the express company to provide updates.
  • Please understand any delays due to time zone differences.

Thank you for choosing Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd. for your vaping needs.

Company Profile

Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd. is a professional disposable vape manufacturer based in Shenzhen, China. Since our establishment in 2013, we have focused on research and development, producing a variety of flavored disposable vapes. With over 20 successful models launched, our products have received widespread acclaim.

Our Advantages:

  • Marketing: Our excellent marketing team gathers market information, analyzes customer feedback, and requirements to guide new product development.
  • R&D: Our strong R&D team, with experience from top vape companies, ensures our products are at the forefront of the market and meet global customer needs. We also offer custom product design services.
  • Purchase: We source premium materials from reputable suppliers in the industry.
  • QC: Quality is a top priority for us. We implement strict quality control processes from incoming materials to final product inspection, ensuring the quality of every order.

Production and Delivery

Welcome to Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd.! We diligently update our production schedule daily to proactively identify and address any potential risks. Our ultimate aim is to ensure that every order is completed and shipped on time, fulfilling our commitment to our valued customers.

Products at Present

Product Description

Welcome to Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd.! Our product line includes two categories: huge puffs and normal puffs. The huge puffs boast 20 models, all equipped with mesh coils for an intense vapor experience. For detailed product information and descriptions, please refer to our Products section.

Brand

Choose from our registered brands, ZOOY and Savage, known worldwide for their quality. Check out reviews of our brands on DH-Gate or other vape industry platforms. We offer OEM production, allowing you to customize products with your own brand and logo, with free package design assistance.

Factory Visit

Located just a short drive from Shenzhen airport, our company welcomes visitors at any time. We look forward to establishing a long-term partnership with you!

FAQ

Welcome to Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd. Are you looking for a reliable Vape Pen manufacturer? Look no further! Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd. is an experienced manufacturer with our own patent molds and production lines. Our Vape Pens are customizable with your brand logo, ensuring a personalized touch to your products. We are located in Shenzhen, near Hong Kong, with our nearest delivery port in Shenzhen, China.

At Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd., we offer a 7 days guarantee on all our Vape Pens, providing you with peace of mind. Our MOQ is 100pcs for each model, with a minimum of 50 sets for sample orders. As a professional Vape Pen manufacturer, our main product line includes Vape Pens, Vape Mods, Disposable Vapes, and Electronic Cigarettes. We prioritize quality control by conducting 100% testing before delivering our goods to you. Experience the quality and reliability of Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd. Vape Pens today!

After Sales Service

Welcome to Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd. If you have any questions or concerns before or after purchasing, please feel free to contact us at any time. We are committed to making you 100% satisfied. Thank you and look forward to working with you!

content.en:
Overview

Introducing the Customized Blueberry Electric Vape with Screen 15K, a luxury vaping device designed for those who seek a high-end, personalized vaping experience. With a sleek design, advanced features, and a delightful watermelon flavor, this rechargeable vape offers up to 15,000 puffs, ensuring long-lasting enjoyment.

Key Features

1. Personalized Customization

  • Custom Design: Tailor the appearance of your vape with customizable options. Choose from a variety of colors, patterns, and engravings to make your device uniquely yours.
  • User Profiles: Save your preferred settings and profiles for a personalized vaping experience every time.

2. Advanced Screen Technology

  • OLED Display: The high-resolution OLED screen provides clear and detailed information, including battery life, puff count, temperature settings, and more.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Navigate through settings effortlessly with an intuitive menu system.

3. Exceptional Performance

  • 15,000 Puffs: Enjoy an extended vaping experience with up to 15,000 puffs per device, making it perfect for long-term use.
  • High-Capacity Battery: Equipped with a 3000mAh rechargeable battery, ensuring you have the power to vape all day without frequent recharging.
  • Fast Charging: Recharge your device quickly with the included USB-C fast charging cable.

4. Delicious Flavors

  • Blueberry Flavor: Experience the refreshing and juicy taste of blueberry with every puff. The flavor is crafted to deliver a consistent and satisfying vaping experience.
  • Additional Flavors: Also available in Strawberry and Kiwi flavors, providing a variety of taste options to suit your preferences.
  • Premium E-Liquid: Made with high-quality ingredients, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable vape.

5. Safety and Reliability

  • Multiple Protections: Built-in safety features such as overheat protection, short-circuit protection, and low voltage protection to ensure safe usage.
  • Durable Build: Constructed with high-quality materials for durability and longevity.

Specifications

  • Dimensions: 24*45*79mm
  • Weight: 70g
  • Battery Capacity: 550mah
  • Screen Type: OLED
  • Puff Count: 15,000 puffs
  • Flavors: Watermelon, Strawberry Kiwi
  • Material: Aluminum Alloy

How to Use

  • Power On/Off: Press the power button five times rapidly to turn the device on or off.
  • Adjust Settings: Use the screen menu to adjust temperature, wattage, and other settings to your preference.
  • Vape: Press and hold the vape button while inhaling to enjoy the watermelon, strawberry, or kiwi flavor.
  • Recharge: Connect the USB-C cable to recharge the device when the battery is low.

2. Delicious electronic cigarette liquid

You don't need to change the chimney frequently because the ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 comes pre installed with 20 milliliters of electronic cigarette juice, allowing you to continue enjoying delicious food. In addition, it also offers you 10 of the most traditional flavor choices, from various flavors to fruit flavors under the sun. Therefore, ZOOY MEGA 12000 is the best choice to meet a range of taste requirements.

3. Strong release of nicotine

ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 is undoubtedly an excellent choice for people who need nicotine immediately. Its 50 milligram nicotine content ensures that you feel satisfied with just one bite, and the nicotine is released quickly, making you feel calm at any time.

content.en:
With people's attention to health and the steady decline in traditional cigarette sales, the electronic cigarette market has opened up new prospects. The eagerly anticipated ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 provides us with a novel way to smoke, yet it remains exquisite and relaxed.

1. Outdoor ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 Design

The exterior design of ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 is simple and fashionable, adopting a streamlined design language, giving people a very comfortable feeling. Due to its small size, it is easy to carry around and does not take up too much space in pockets or backpacks.

2. Delicious electronic cigarette liquid

You don't need to change the chimney frequently because the ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 comes pre-installed with 20 milliliters of electronic cigarette juice, allowing you to continue enjoying delicious food. In addition, it also offers you 10 of the most traditional flavor choices, from various flavors to fruit flavors under the sun. Therefore, ZOOY MEGA 12000 is the best choice to meet a range of taste requirements.

3. Strong release of nicotine

ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 is undoubtedly an excellent choice for people who need nicotine immediately. Its 50 milligram nicotine content ensures that you feel satisfied with just one bite, and the nicotine is released quickly, making you feel calm at any time.

ZOOYVAPE Rainbow box 16000

  • 110g | 26ml
  • 20mg/50mg nic salt
  • 650mAh battery
  • Built-in Smart Display
  • TYPE-C / Adjustable Power

With over 20 successful models launched, we are proud to be recognized for our innovation and quality.

  • Purchase: We source premium materials from reputable suppliers to guarantee the quality of our products.
  • QC: We prioritize quality control at every stage of production, from initial inspection to final quality checks, ensuring that your orders meet the highest standards.

Production and Delivery

At Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd., we pride ourselves on our commitment to updating our production schedule daily to identify and address potential risks promptly. Our primary goal is to ensure that every order is completed and shipped on time, as promised to our valued customers.

Products at present

Product Description

Our product line includes two categories: huge puffs and normal puffs. The huge puffs boast 20 models, all equipped with mesh coils for an intense vapor experience. For detailed product information and descriptions, please refer to our "Products" section.

Brand

Choose from our registered brands, ZOOY and Savage, known worldwide for their exceptional quality. Check out reviews of our brands on DH-Gate or other vape industry platforms. Our brands have a strong reputation and appeal to new buyers. Alternatively, opt for OEM production to customize products with your brand and logo, with complimentary package design assistance.

Factory Visit

Located just a short drive from Shenzhen airport, our company welcomes visitors at any time. We look forward to establishing a long-term partnership with you!

Factory Visit

Located just a short drive from Shenzhen airport, our company welcomes visitors at any time. We look forward to establishing a long-term partnership with you!

FAQ

After Sales Service

Welcome to Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd. If you have any questions or concerns before or after purchasing, please feel free to contact us at any time. We are committed to making you 100% satisfied. Thank you and look forward to working with you!

content.en:
Overview

Introducing the Customized Strawberry Kiwi Electric Vape with Screen 15K, a luxury vaping device designed for those who seek a high-end, personalized vaping experience. With a sleek design, advanced features, and a delightful strawberry kiwi flavor, this rechargeable vape offers up to 15,000 puffs, ensuring long-lasting enjoyment.

Key Features

1. Personalized Customization

  • Custom Design: Tailor the appearance of your vape with customizable options. Choose from a variety of colors, patterns, and engravings to make your device uniquely yours.
  • User Profiles: Save your preferred settings and profiles for a personalized vaping experience every time.

2. Advanced Screen Technology

  • OLED Display: The high-resolution OLED screen provides clear and detailed information, including battery life, puff count, temperature settings, and more.
  • User-Friendly Interface: Navigate through settings effortlessly with an intuitive menu system.

3. Exceptional Performance

  • 15,000 Puffs: Enjoy an extended vaping experience with up to 15,000 puffs per device, making it perfect for long-term use.
  • High-Capacity Battery: Equipped with a 3000mAh rechargeable battery, ensuring you have the power to vape all day without frequent recharging.
  • Fast Charging: Recharge your device quickly with the included USB-C fast charging cable.

4. Delicious Flavors

  • Strawberry Kiwi Flavor: Experience the refreshing and juicy taste of strawberry kiwi with every puff. The flavor is crafted to deliver a consistent and satisfying vaping experience.
  • Additional Flavors: Also available in Strawberry and Kiwi flavors, providing a variety of taste options to suit your preferences.
  • Premium E-Liquid: Made with high-quality ingredients, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable vape.

5. Safety and Reliability

  • Multiple Protections: Built-in safety features such as overheat protection, short-circuit protection, and low voltage protection to ensure safe usage.
  • Durable Build: Constructed with high-quality materials for durability and longevity.

Specifications

  • Dimensions: 24*45*79mm
  • Weight: 70g
  • Battery Capacity: 550mAh
  • Screen Type: OLED
  • Puff Count: 15,000 puffs
  • Flavors: Strawberry Kiwi, Strawberry, Kiwi
  • Material: Aluminum Alloy

How to Use

  • Power On/Off: Press the power button five times rapidly to turn the device on or off.
  • Adjust Settings: Use the screen menu to adjust temperature, wattage, and other settings to your preference.
  • Vape: Press and hold the vape button while inhaling to enjoy the strawberry kiwi, strawberry, or kiwi flavor.
  • Recharge: Connect the USB-C cable to recharge the device when the battery is low.

content.en:

1. Exterior ZOOY MEGA 12000 design

The ZOOY MEGA 12000's outside design is straightforward and stylish, using a streamlined design language, and it has a very cozy feel. It is quite easy to carry around thanks to its small size, and it doesn't take up much room in a pocket or backpack.

2. Delectable e-cigarette liquid

You don't need to often replace cigarette cartridges because the ZOOY MEGA 12000 comes pre-loaded with 20 milliliters of e-cigarette juice, which allows you to keep enjoying great food. Additionally, it provides you with a choice of 10 of the most traditional flavors, from everything to fruit flavors in the sun. Due to this, ZOOY MEGA 12000 is the best option for addressing a range of taste requirements.

3. A strong release of nicotine

ZOOY MEGA 12000 is unquestionably a wonderful option for people who need nicotine immediately. Its 50 milligram nicotine content guarantees that you'll feel satisfied after only one bite, and the nicotine releases quickly, letting you feel calm whenever you want.

4. A powerful battery

One of the main considerations in choosing to use an electronic cigarette is typically battery longevity. A 650mAh rechargeable battery that has a long lifespan and the ability to raise resist voltage by four times powers the ZOOY MEGA 12000. This enables you to utilize it without fear of the battery running out.

5. Security concerns

Safety is essential when smoking electronic cigarettes. To guarantee that you don't run into any safety difficulties when using it, the ZOOY MEGA 12000 employs cutting-edge safety technology, including features like overcharging protection, over discharge protection, and short circuit protection.

6. Simple to use

Even those who have never used an e-cigarette before can simply get started using the ZOOY MEGA 12000 because of how simple it is to operate. Simple button settings are all that are required; just sip to enjoy. Because of its convenience, both new and seasoned e-cigarette users favor it.

The ZOOY MEGA 12000 features a sleek, minimalist design with premium materials that feel comfortable in hand. Its compact size makes it highly portable, easily fitting in pockets or bags without taking up much space.

Pre-filled with 20ml of high-quality e-liquid, the ZOOY MEGA 12000 eliminates frequent cartridge changes. It offers 10 classic flavor options ranging from fruity to refreshing blends, catering to diverse taste preferences.

3. Potent Nicotine Delivery

With 50mg nicotine salt content, the ZOOY MEGA 12000 provides immediate satisfaction. Its rapid nicotine release system ensures quick calming effects whenever needed.

4. Long-Lasting Battery

Powered by a 650mAh rechargeable battery featuring 4x voltage boost technology, the device delivers consistent performance without worrying about frequent charging.

5. Advanced Safety Features

Incorporating cutting-edge protection including overcharge prevention, over-discharge protection, and short-circuit safeguards for worry-free usage.

6. User-Friendly Operation

Simple button controls and intuitive design make the ZOOY MEGA 12000 accessible for both beginners and experienced vapers alike.

content.en:
Overview

Discover the ultimate vaping experience with the Fruit Flavored Small Crystal Rechargeable Disposable Vape. This sleek, pen-style vape offers the perfect combination of convenience, style, and flavor. Designed for vapers who appreciate quality and portability, this device is rechargeable and comes in a variety of cool fruit flavors.

Key Features

  • Rechargeable Design: The Crystal Rechargeable Disposable Vape can be recharged, providing an extended lifespan and reducing waste.
  • Compact and Portable: Its small, pen-style design makes it easy to carry anywhere, ensuring you can enjoy your favorite flavors on the go.
  • Fruit Flavored Delight: Available in delicious flavors such as Kiwi, Strawberry, Peach, Mango, and Watermelon, each puff delivers a burst of refreshing taste.
  • High-Quality Materials: Made from premium materials, this vape ensures durability and safety with every use.
  • Adjustable Airflow: Customize your vaping experience with adjustable airflow settings, allowing you to control the intensity of each puff.
  • Nicotine Options: Available with nicotine, catering to those who prefer a nicotine hit.

Technical Specifications

  • Battery Capacity: 500mAh rechargeable battery
  • Charging Time: Approximately 1 hour
  • Usage Duration: Up to 3000 puffs per charge
  • E-Liquid Capacity: 2ml
  • Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg)
  • Dimensions: 100mm x 20mm x 10mm
  • Weight: 30g
  • Color: Sleek black finish

How to Use

  1. Charge the Device: Use the included USB cable to fully charge the vape before first use.
  2. Inhale to Activate: Simply inhale through the mouthpiece to start vaping. No buttons needed.
  3. Adjust Airflow: Customize your vaping experience with the adjustable airflow feature.
  4. Recharge as Needed: When the battery runs low, recharge using the USB cable.

content.en:
Overview

Introducing the Customized Grape Electric Vape with Screen 15K, a luxury vaping device designed for those who seek a high-end, personalized vaping experience. With a sleek design, advanced features, and a delightful grape flavor, this rechargeable vape offers up to 15,000 puffs, ensuring long-lasting enjoyment.

Key Features

  1. Personalized Customization
    • Custom Design: Tailor the appearance of your vape with customizable options. Choose from a variety of colors, patterns, and engravings to make your device uniquely yours.
    • User Profiles: Save your preferred settings and profiles for a personalized vaping experience every time.
  2. Advanced Screen Technology
    • OLED Display: The high-resolution OLED screen provides clear and detailed information, including battery life, puff count, temperature settings, and more.
    • User-Friendly Interface: Navigate through settings effortlessly with an intuitive menu system.
  3. Exceptional Performance
    • 15,000 Puffs: Enjoy an extended vaping experience with up to 15,000 puffs per device, making it perfect for long-term use.
    • High-Capacity Battery: Equipped with a 3000mAh rechargeable battery, ensuring you have the power to vape all day without frequent recharging.
    • Fast Charging: Recharge your device quickly with the included USB-C fast charging cable.
  4. Delicious Flavors
    • Grape Flavor: Experience the refreshing and juicy taste of grape with every puff. The flavor is crafted to deliver a consistent and satisfying vaping experience.
    • Additional Flavors: Also available in Strawberry and Kiwi flavors, providing a variety of taste options to suit your preferences.
    • Premium E-Liquid: Made with high-quality ingredients, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable vape.
  5. Safety and Reliability
    • Multiple Protections: Built-in safety features such as overheat protection, short-circuit protection, and low voltage protection to ensure safe usage.
    • Durable Build: Constructed with high-quality materials for durability and longevity.

Specifications

  • Dimensions: 24*45*79mm
  • Weight: 70g
  • Battery Capacity: 550mAh
  • Screen Type: OLED
  • Puff Count: 15,000 puffs
  • Flavors: Grape, Strawberry, Kiwi
  • Material: Aluminum Alloy

How to Use

  1. Power On/Off: Press the power button five times rapidly to turn the device on or off.
  2. Adjust Settings: Use the screen menu to adjust temperature, wattage, and other settings to your preference.
  3. Vape: Press and hold the vape button while inhaling to enjoy the grape, strawberry, or kiwi flavor.
  4. Recharge: Connect the USB-C cable to recharge the device when the battery is low.

content.en:
Overview

Introducing the Customized Watermelon Electric Vape with Screen 16K, a luxury vaping device designed for those who seek a high-end, personalized vaping experience. With a sleek design, advanced features, and a delightful watermelon flavor, this rechargeable vape offers up to 16,000 puffs, ensuring long-lasting enjoyment.

Key Features

1. Personalized Customization

  • Custom Design: Tailor the appearance of your vape with customizable options. Choose from a variety of colors, patterns, and engravings to make your device uniquely yours.
  • User Profiles: Save your preferred settings and profiles for a personalized vaping experience every time.

2. Advanced Screen Technology

  • OLED Display: The high-resolution OLED screen provides clear and detailed information, including battery life, puff count, temperature settings, and more.

  • Material: Aluminum Alloy

How to Use

  • Power On/Off: Press the power button five times rapidly to turn the device on or off.

  • Vape: Press and hold the vape button while inhaling to enjoy the watermelon, strawberry, or kiwi flavor.
  • Recharge: Connect the USB-C cable to recharge the device when the battery is low.

1. Outdoor ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 Design

The exterior design of ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 is simple and fashionable, adopting a streamlined design language, giving people a very comfortable feeling. Due to its small size, it is easy to carry around and does not take up too much space in pockets or backpacks.

2. Delicious electronic cigarette liquid

You don't need to change the chimney frequently because the ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 comes pre-installed with 20 milliliters of electronic cigarette juice, allowing you to continue enjoying delicious food. In addition, it also offers you 10 of the most traditional flavor choices, from various flavors to fruit flavors under the sun. Therefore, ZOOY MEGA 12000 is the best choice to meet a range of taste requirements.

3. Strong release of nicotine

ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 is undoubtedly an excellent choice for people who need nicotine immediately. Its 50 milligram nicotine content ensures that you feel satisfied with just one bite, and the nicotine is released quickly, making you feel calm at any time.

content.en:
With people's attention to health and the steady decline in traditional cigarette sales, the electronic cigarette market has opened up new prospects. The eagerly anticipated ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 provides us with a novel way to smoke, yet it remains exquisite and relaxed.

1. Outdoor ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 Design

The exterior design of ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 is simple and fashionable, adopting a streamlined design language, giving people a very comfortable feeling. Due to its small size, it is easy to carry around and does not take up too much space in pockets or backpacks.

2. Delicious electronic cigarette liquid

You don't need to change the chimney frequently because the ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 comes pre installed with 20 milliliters of electronic cigarette juice, allowing you to continue enjoying delicious food. In addition, it also offers you 10 of the most traditional flavor choices, from various flavors to fruit flavors under the sun. Therefore, ZOOY MEGA 12000 is the best choice to meet a range of taste requirements.

3. Strong release of nicotine

ZOOY Rainbow Box 16000 is undoubtedly an excellent choice for people who need nicotine immediately. Its 50 milligram nicotine content ensures that you feel satisfied with just one bite, and the nicotine is released quickly, making you feel calm at any time.

  • Purchase: We source premium materials from reputable suppliers to guarantee the quality of our products.
  • QC: We prioritize quality control at every stage of production, from initial inspection to final quality checks, ensuring that your orders meet the highest standards.

Production and Delivery

At Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd., we pride ourselves on our commitment to updating our production schedule daily to identify and address potential risks promptly. Our primary goal is to ensure that every order is completed and shipped on time, as promised to our valued customers.

Products at present

Welcome to Shenzhen Zooy Vape Technology Co., Ltd.! Our product line includes two categories: huge puffs and normal puffs. The huge puffs boast 20 models, all equipped with mesh coils for an intense vapor experience. For detailed product information and descriptions, please refer to our "Products" section.

Choose from our registered brands, ZOOY and Savage, known worldwide for their exceptional quality. Check out reviews of our brands on DH-Gate or other vape industry platforms. Our brands have a strong reputation and appeal to new buyers. Alternatively, opt for OEM production to customize products with your brand and logo, with complimentary package design assistance.

Factory Visit

Located just a short drive from Shenzhen airport, our company welcomes visitors at any time. We look forward to establishing a long-term partnership with you!
